entry.title: $2295 // No Fee , Gorgeous Sunny Large 2 Bed, City Views, By D.N.R Trains
entry.content:
NO FEE - Large 2 Bed with City Views - Located in Prime Greenwood
Steps to the D.N.R trains

Contact For A Showing 347-563-5554, or naftli@zjamarealty.com

Apartment Features:
- Large open living room, with exposed brick and great sunlight
- Stunning kitchen, with stainless steal appliances
- Fully tiled bathroom
- 2 queen size bedrooms
- Hardwood floors
- Pet friendly
- Utilities are paid by tenant

This apartment is located steps to the R train and a short walk to the D.N trains.
You are close by to many trendy cafes, pubs, restaurants that 5th Ave has to offer. Costco is not too far as well. **Contact for a showing**

Phone: 347-563-5554
Email: naftali@zjamarealty.com
